meanings.sent1: The nonfunctioning computer screen displayed only a black screen.
meanings.sent2: The broken clock was nonfunctioning and stuck at the same time.
meanings.sent3: The nonfunctioning toaster decided to take a break from toasting bread.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfunctioning phone was like a silent companion, unable to connect her to the world.
meanings.sent5: The nonfunctioning car engine sputtered and refused to start, leaving them stranded.

meanings.sent1: The nonfunctioning flashlight failed to light up the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The nonfunctioning microphone distorted the singer's voice during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The nonfunctioning umbrella decided it was too cool to shield from the rain.
meanings.sent4: His nonfunctioning watch was a reminder of time slipping away without purpose.
meanings.sent5: The nonfunctioning remote control refused to change the TV channel, causing frustration.

meanings.definition: Not functioning as expected or required.
meanings.sent1: The nonfunctioning elevator made everyone take the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The nonfunctioning printer jammed every time it tried to print a document.
meanings.sent3: The nonfunctioning traffic light played a game of red, yellow, and green all at once.
meanings.sent4: Her nonfunctioning alarm clock was like a silent observer of her oversleeping habits.
meanings.sent5: The nonfunctioning air conditioner turned the room into a sauna, much to everyone's discomfort.
